content.detailedDescription:
1. driving down academy
2. looked straight ahead an noticed the lights moving in a path parallel
3. at first thought a street light and possibly a star until it moved
4. orange orbs that were pulsating their light in a steady pattern, at first only 2, one above and to the right with the other below. the second one moved directly under the first and faded. then a third appeared above the second to the left and descended to just above the second one but remained to the left. the third then faded and the second reappeared to below and right of the first. the second and first then started to move toward each other. the second one is then faded again. the first stayed still for a few minutes and then slowly faded.
5. at first a little bit of shock and pleasantness, knowing i have had my first true observation. continued to drive toward the orbs that were in the southern direction. after had a kind thought of if they came back and put me at unease.
6.They faded out
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three orangish orbs pulsating and going back and forth and then fading out

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to a friend on the phone,she stepped outside to talk and she said i think im seeing a ufo with a beam coming out the bottom it i said you sure its not a helicopter, she said no its got blinking lights but its moving ready slow and no sound. i ran out the back to the river and seen it, it was heading north.I thought it was a star at first but then it started to shuffle like.At this time it looked blue and i couldnt see the blinking lights but it seemed as it was getting bigger then smaller(like a big star then little star and did this a few times) and it moved behind the trees so i ran inside( i hung up on my friend then) grabbed the binocs and watched it thru those. it seemed to be orange reddish then and it was shuffling again then it started to do crazy moving like circles and zig zags and such it was crazy then it was gone in a heart beat.I didnt take a picture at the time ...Im still kicking myself for that.
content.summary: Freind called light with beam coming down from it ,went and watched it  saw it leave

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to a friend on the phone,she stepped outside to talk and she said i think im seeing a ufo with a beam coming out the bottom it i said you sure its not a helicopter, she said no its got blinking lights but its moving ready slow and no sound. i ran out the back to the river and seen it, it was heading north.I thought it was a star at first but then it started to shuffle like.At this time it looked blue and i couldnt see the blinking lights but it seemed as it was getting bigger then smaller(like a big star then little star and did this a few times) and it moved behind the trees so i ran inside( i hung up on my friend then) grabbed the binocs and watched it thru those. it seemed to be orange reddish then and it was shuffling again then it started to do crazy moving like circles and zig zags and such it was crazy then it was gone in a heart beat.I didnt take a picture at the time ...Im still kicking myself for that.
content.summary: Freind called light with beam coming down from it ,went and watched it  saw it leave

content.detailedDescription: Me and some of my family were driving to church on marine drive around 7:00 p.M. and i was looking out the window, when i noticed 3 red colored spheres in the vicinity of portland international airport. at first i believed them to be helicopters, but a helicopter could not replicate the rapid changes in direction these objects made. i kept my eyes on them, and they were swooping around each other, almost like a dance, getting close then moving back out, always smoothly but rapidly. we turned off of marine drive continuing to our destination and i lost sight of the objects.
content.summary: 3 spheres swooping around each other over portland international airport

content.detailedDescription: Me and some of my family were driving to church on marine drive around 7:00 p.M. and i was looking out the window, when i noticed 3 red colored spheres in the vicinity of portland international airport. at first i believed them to be helicopters, but a helicopter could not replicate the rapid changes in direction these objects made. i kept my eyes on them, and they were swooping around each other, almost like a dance, getting close then moving back out, always smoothly but rapidly. we turned off of marine drive continuing to our destination and i lost sight of the objects.
content.summary: 3 spheres swooping around each other over portland international airport

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house, laying down and watching the stars, when a light appeared, flew in straight line, and then disappeared. i took it for a falling star and paid it no mind. minutes go by and another light appeared, this time much closer, flew over me and disappeared. i was shocked the second time around because it didn't look like a falling star, it looked like an object with multiple lights attached to it. i waited to see if another one would appear but nothing happened after that.
content.summary: A light appeared, went in a straight line and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke a cig and saw a yellowish light in space. the sky was perfectly clear.  i call my grlfriend to come out and it started moving south for a minute real slow and then east and then west and stopped.  it's been about 20 minutes now and it's still there.  pretty darn weird.  wish i knew what it was.  can't be space station and i'm pretty sure satelites down move around and then stay in same place.  tried video taping but the moon is so bright its not coming up.
content.summary: Yellowish light in space changing direction the stopping.

content.detailedDescription:
Lander, wy
04/03/2011
11:38pm-12:08am (about this time)
bright object pulsing red, blue, white.
about 195 degrees s.Sw, distance unknown, 
about 30 derees up from horizon.
 
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time. i went out on our back porch to smoke a cigarett when i saw the light.I go out there to smoke every night.

2. what made you first notice the object? it was not what i normaly see in the sky.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? well i knew something was up!

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.Bright object pulsing red, blue, white.
about 195 degrees s.Sw, distance unknown, 
about 30 derees up from horizon.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.I was surprised! 

6. how did you lose sight of the object? it just seemed to disapear? or fade away?
content.summary: Unknown object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 7pm on saturday night, december 3, 2011.  three friends and i were enroute to charlotte, nc, from poinsett bridge near travelers rest, sc. i was driving northeast on sc-ll (cherokee foothills scenic hwy) when i spotted an explosion of lights in the night sky to my right.  i immediately called attention to the display of lights.  robin perry was riding shotgun.  she caught sight of what captured my eye as it transformed into a cigar-shaped (cylindrical) object aglow in a bluish-white hue.  although it appeared to be miles high and away from us, it was the size of a huge jetliner lengthwise but twice as wide.  within moments, this glowing object divided into half.  the two equal size objects ... now glowing white ... descended in opposite directions at forty-five degree angles.  they disappeared below the horizon.  time seemed to stand still as i continued driving down the rural highway at 55 miles per hour.  the two occupants in the backseat, shay sommer and nancy queen, didn't see the ufo but they saw and heard robin and i reacting to our sighting of a ufo. as crazy as it sounds, this display was beautiful to behold ... absolutely mesmerizing.  

robin and i were excited by the sighting.  we had gone to poinsett bridge on a paranormal investigation.  we were slightly disappointed we had travelled so far and gathered no evidence of a haunting.  the futherest thing on our minds was sighting a ufo.  nancy and shay were greatly disappointed that they didn't see anything due to their seating positions. although we had cameras with us, no one thought to take pictures.  it probably doesn't matter as the car was in motion and it happened too fast.    

i continued driving until we merged onto interstate 26.  we stopped at the first restaurant we saw, which was a waffle house.  nancy didn't see anything but shay recalled a bright light.  she thought it was emitted from a billboard.  several days later, she realized there were no lit billboards on the highway. 

none of us are aware of any missing time as we arrived back in gastonia about 9pm which would be about right.
content.summary: Noticed ufo due to firework display, then hovered, divided in half, and descended

content.detailedDescription: Was outside at harrisburg east campground in harrisburg, pa, and observed a bright point of light, about pea sized at arms length,due west about 40 degrees from horizon. it was 4:36pm, edt, a very bright afternoon with a bright sun directly above the light. my initial thought was sun reflecting off of a plane. the light grew brighter, then back to original brightness twice over a period of about 15 - 20 seconds. then it quickly disappeared. i waited a few minutes, expecting to see either more light or a plane appear, but it did not. i'm very skepitcal about ufo sightings, but this just seemed odd to me. by the way, harrisburg airport is nearby.
content.summary: Single point of light, varied brightness, then dissappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a yellowish orange orb flying at the same level inner city helicopters fly at, and assumed that's what it was until it got closer and there was no sound. there was no shape or distinctions other than it being a sphere of light. two neighbors walking past saw it as well. i had a camera in my bag and took a blurry shot. then quickly set my camera to video and followed it as it flew away from me. this was (i think) on sat mar 24th around 11pm. it flew from the nw to the se and then curved due east. 

i put the video on my ipad and showed a few people. the image is only visible for a few seconds. 10 days later i was riding my bike in the same neighborhood after work at 1:20am and saw a light in the sky from the ne coming towards me. i immediately recognized it as an object just like the one i saw previously. it was flying at the same level, same speed, was the same color, and was silent. it flew almost right over me towards the sw. 

my friends were in a car a few blocks behind me and had seen the previous video i took. the passenger saw the light and recognized it and was watching it. when they reached me stopped on the road, they pulled over and were able to see it going further away from us toward the sw. then it either went into some low clouds or just sort of dissipated. we could see stars and the moon, but there could have been some random clouds. it seemed to be traveling at about the speed a traffic helicopter would be going at, but slower than a medical helicopter. it was also at about that height, but again, absolutely no noise. it was also going against the wind, though it seemed to be floating as opposed to flying a very perfectly solid straight line. 

file 1: video from march 24
file 2: video from april 5
file 3: still photo from april 5 video with a) original b) shadows lessened by photoshop c) color saturation increased by photoshop d) color saturation removed by photoshop
content.summary: Silent yellowish orb flying from ne to sw. 1:20 am. 2nd time in a week i saw this in the same neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on 23rd street past noland road in independence, missouri on march 18 at sunset when i suddenly had the urge to take photos of the sky ahead of me.  i sensed a large object in the sky, but did not see anything with the naked eye.  this has only happened to me one other time --and at that time i also captured a ufo on camera.  i did not see anything with the naked eye in either instance.  when i downloaded the photos several days later i noticed that there was an object that moved from the north to the south across the street in front of me and apparently just under cloud cover.  two of the three pictures are clear, one is unfortunately not good quality.  however, out of the two good pictures you can clearly see a chevron-shaped craft with amber color lights along the bottom of it- i see three lights on each "wing."  at the time, since i sensed there was something in the sky i was on the lookout for low flying planes or helicopters but saw none. there was absolutely no sound.  if a plane that large had been that close i would have heard something.  this object looks huge. it does not look like artifacts from the street lights causing glare.  the object changes position, and since i took the pictures while driving along, they are not taken from the exact same location.  yet the object remains in all three photos- and is the same size and shape in all three photos.
content.summary: Huge ufo caught on camera in independence, missouri

content.detailedDescription:
Different groups of lights. different colors, shapes and glow patterns. the video shows then gon at certain points, but i was just repositioning myself. i'm not sure how long they stayed. i left the window.
there is an airport around 6-8 miles away, but not in that direction at all
i saw 1 ufo around 12 years ago in marco island, fla. totally different over the bay. triangle shaped. watched that one for 45 minutes until it shot away horizontally so fast i couldn't believe it. it had blinking lights, but i can't remember the color.
content.summary: Strange formation of lights out my window.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my house to take my dogs to the dog park down the road at 9:15pm. as i left the drive way i called my dad. the dogs leashes got tangled a couple feet away from the driveway so i stopped to untangle them. the moment i finished untangling them i looked up into the sky and that's when i seen the first orb coming across the sky from the south at 9:21pm. you could tell the orb was solid but it was also semi translucent and very dark compared to the rest of the evening sky. 
there was two very small red/orange lights in the center of the orb. the lights didn't give off any glare or shine in any direction, it was a self contained light right in the center. 
as the orb passed right above my dogs and i, it split into two identical orbs; when this happened i lost my phone call to my dad. they were the exact same size as before and as each other, they both had the two small red/orange lights in the center of them. 
they continued into the northeast direction, they traveled faster then any conventional aircraft i have ever seen before. when they were 3/4 the way across the sky they speed off into the horizon and disappeared from sight, there was a flash of white light as the orbs picked up speed and vanished. just as they speed off a plane flew right into there previous pathway from the north. two minutes after they had disappeared a black helicopter flew across the exact same pathway as the orbs from the northeast to the south at approx. the same elevation as the orbs as well. 
my dogs even watched the orbs go across the sky as it happened, they got excited and wanted to chase the orbs when they speed off and vanished from sight. the moment i lost sight of them i called my dad back and told him what happened.
he was surprised, excited, and wanted to know all about it. my dad has always been a believer that we are not alone in the universe and i have always shared this belief with him.
when i had first seen the orb i knew right away what it was, i had no doubts in my mind. i have never actually seen a ufo that looked like this before nor have i heard anyone describe one like this before.
i always observe the skies when i am out and about and i have seen many anomalous activities in the skies over the years, day or night, however it has been years since i have seen a ufo so close to me. 
yes, i have seen a ufo close up before; when i was very young i seen a huge ufo stop and hover above me and then take off quickly. however that ufo years ago was much different then this one and made a slight hum sound and encompassed the entire sky it was so close to me.
i got excited when i seen the first orb since it has been years since i had seen a ufo so close up. ever since my first encounter with ufo's i was hooked and i couldn't take my eyes of the skies hoping to catch another glimpse of something unusual. 
the orbs remained in sight for 2 minutes but those 2 minutes seemed like an eternity and i got a very good look at them. the image of them is burned into my memory. i keep replaying the events in my mind and everything is so clear. as i kept walking with my dogs i kept watching the sky closely to see if they would appear again but they did not. if i do see them again i will post again :) 
i wish i had a camera to take a video or picture..
content.summary: One orb moved swiftly and silently across the night sky. half across the horizon the orb split into two identical orbs and then shot off into the sky and dissapeared from sight.

content.detailedDescription: Well i came home and looked up at the sky and there was some object hovering above the moon my dad said it looked odd.
content.summary: The ufo was hovering above the moon and got really bright and then dark

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my son took this photo on his i-phone when flying out of heathrow airport on july 14th 2011 on way to atlanta, usa. he didn't actually notice the craft at the time as he was just taking a snap out of the window shortly after take off.The craft must have been seen by crew or passengers. i can supply more details if you are interested. thanks, keith
content.summary: You can see in the photo

content.detailedDescription: Okay so i usually take out my dog out for a walk around the hours 12:30-1am eastern time. when i walked her out on 4/3/2012 around that time first thing i notice when i get out of my house is my dog barking (yorkie mix). now i disregarded the barking as this is what i find to be  a normal behavior of dogs. i crossed the street across and walked up the end of that block but throughout the way my dog continued to bark.I found it unusual that there were no other animals outside. on a normal night you see alot of stray cats that come out or just wild birds. it was eerily quiet. the sky was filled with white clouds with blue backdrop. there was only two more people outside around this time. its a quiet neighborhood with no cars passing by and dimly lit. i wear glasses and so i thought i was seeing flashes of a camera and was trying to find the source. the light was bothering my eyes. i couldnt see anything and i just looked up. as i did i was astonished and could not believe what i was seeing. i saw approx 5+ lights in a constant circular motion hovering above me with the blue background no clouds covering it.  it was small in diameter and would remain in a circular motion and these lights would come together to one large circle then again spread out into these separate individual lights. it was an unusual pattern and i tried to identify what it was. the airports are not that far from our town and because so i knew it wasnt a helicopter, plane or anything that was apparent in our usual normal days. my first instinct gut feeling was to get out of there and run home. the duration looking at the lights was for 3-4 mins. i then picked up my dog and ran home. as i was opening the door in a frantic i looked behind me and it felt as if it had followed me. it literally moved from its stationary spot hovering right above the 3 story residential feder building that i live in. i ran up the stairs and woke up my family to look outside. as they glanced outside 15 mins later the lights had expanded in diameter and covered a much wider area. this time over the white clouds. it remained as such for approx an hour. i felt safer at home but was not going to sleep until i did something about it. so i posted it on my facebook, contacted the media via facebook too. i called 311 to report this phenomenona and they said to contact the media. i was so reluctant to call and so i waited those first 45mins to contact anyone. all three of us mom, sister and myself took turns looking outside. i kept my dog on the couch she slepping but began to shake as if having a nightmare or something. i tried to pick her up and she jerked off frightened. i spoke to her softly and held her close comforting her. she was quiet the whole time. an hour later when i looked outside they were gone. we all checked and they just disappeared. no lights nothing......I couldnt record anything because it wasnt clear enough for my mobile device and camera to pick up. sketch enclosed to show pattern of lights
content.summary: 5+ lights in a constant circular motion for approximately an hour expanding in diameter

content.detailedDescription: We were heading northbound on i-5 at around 10:30-11ish at night. my boyfriend and i were listening to music when i happened to catch something out of the corner of my eyes. i look to the left and over lake samish, there were two giant, rectangular objects ascending from behind the mountain. when right above the mountain they stopped and just hovered there. they were one of the brightest reds i have ever seen in my life. it looked like 2 casino sized monitor boards or larger that were bright red. they had lines going through them almost like a t.V. of some sort. i immediately told my boyfriend to look at them. it was pouring down rain so he couldn't look until the last second, but he saw them. we were already late home from my grandmas, so we couldn't turn around to go back and see them. i texted my dad as soon as i saw them because i was scared. i know for a fact that these weren't the usual aircraft beacons because, they were bright red, football size, monitor-like objects that ascended from behind the mountain and stopped there. they were so bright you could see the space between the two. i could draw exactly what ive seen 100 times again. i have no idea what it was, but i know for a fact it wasn't from this earth.
content.summary: 2 giant rectangular objects hovering over mountain

content.detailedDescription: I had moved in with my fiance' ; now my husband. one night in the early morning hours in 1991 ; i was woken up by a bright blinding light shining  through the window of our bedroom window. i also heard a loud humming sound. it startled me. i had woke up and looked up at the window. my husband didnt budge at all. i looked back to the room and saw four short greyish figures with big dark eyes standing by our bed; one was standing by me ; looking at me. i could see that they were all about 3-4 feet tall. light grey ; big head, small mouth/nose, skinny neck; body was not porportioned with their head size, body was smaller in size, big dark oval eyes, long skinny arms; long skinny fingers,they made a weird voice type noise;like a soft robotic sound.  i could see two more at the foot of bed and one to the side of my husband.I saw the one by my husband; touching my husbands  shoulder. i was frightened and was watching them . i didnt know what to do . i could not move or scream; like i was paralyzed or something. it felt like my arms, my head,and legs were being held down. all i could do was move my eyes to see what they were doing. i tried to holler at my husband but i could not say anything at all. the one that was looking at me; was moving its head side to side looking at me; like he was  observing me or something. i seen its hand come up toward me. right after that ; i dont remember anything else that happened .Time had lapsed into daytime; hours later. i started remembering what had happened that next night. bits and pieces. but the next day and following a few days later; me and my husband noticed that we had gooey; jelly type ooze that kept coming out of both of our belly buttons.When we showered ; we both had said something about the goo to each other. i told him that i had the same stuff coming from mine to. we did not what it was; we felt tired the next day and the days followng that. i didnt put two to two together until days later; after what had happened. it is like i remember what happened the time of seeing them and everything else was blocked. after days going by; i kept getting sick off and on ; feeling drained. at one time i had to be taken to hospital but they did not know what was wrong with me. i had headaches; dizziness and nauseousness. it was like i couldnt breathe or something. to this day we dont know what happened to us both. we have since moved from the area it happened; a year later. i am still puzzled about it all but i know what i saw and it was not a dream either.I am a light sleeper and it was no dream. i was woken up by the bright lights and then seeing those things were terrifying. it was the most frightening thing that happened to me. i was awake and then i saw  them; then all else was blocked from me. they were there and then gone in a flash. thats all i know; i still want to know what happened to us and what the ooze was in our belly button area. we still would like to know what took place with us that night. i still think about it today. i could sketch it but i will not at this time.
content.summary: We were sleeping and a bright light shined through bedroom window. it woke me and i saw 4 short grey figures at our bed. one at my side of the bed ; two at end of the bed ; and one moved to my fiance's side of the bed. i tried to scream but i  could not.

content.detailedDescription: I see it every night, not sure what it is, i have many pics and videos of it and i'm hoping somebody can identify it as something whether it be a ufo or not, but its basically a random-flashing multicoloured star-like thing that just travels across the sky like the other stars but doesn't look anything like them. last night i was able to get better pics because it just seemed to be coming in extra bright. the colours i see flashing are red, yellow, green, blue and white, i am unsure if there is a pattern. i'm very excited to find out what this is and am gonna keep observing until i find out.
content.summary: A pic and some videos of 'rainbow star' i been seeing

content.detailedDescription:
My husband watching tv in front of by window first saw the orange light coming from south to north, pulsating. went out with camera and observes light still moving same direction then hovered and disappeared. took a short movie but quality is poor. then second light appeared same direction color and mo. light also disappeared as other one did. i observed an helicopter flying same path right after second light disappeared. lights had no noise and was a bright orange &pulsating. helicopter was very loud.
i was very excited and shaking all at once. 
i am used to planes flying over my area towards palm beach airport. this was  completely different objects without blinking or engine noise. also quite big compare to an approaching plane.
content.summary: Light appeared going south to north orange pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
monday evening at about 7:50 my grandson  saw these ufos fly over baytown.  they were headed west and suddenly flew away at tremendous speed without any noise.  good to know that the aliens haven't left us out
 
date: mon, 2 apr 2012 20:37:21 -0500
 
he saw this this evening about 7:50pm. the formation was traveling toward houston and suddenly accelerated at high speed. photo is fuzzy due to zooming in with camera phone. 
 

sent from my iphone
content.summary: They were in a trangel formation

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:49pm on march 31, 2012 i was sitting around a fire pit at the arizona grand resort in phoenix, az with my husband, two sons and some other people.  i was enjoying the weather (80-83 degrees f) and completely clear skies while on vacation from oregon.  there was a very slight breeze

i had pointed out orion's belt to my sons earlier in the evening and was tracking it's progress across the night sky in relation to where the moon was.  as i was visiting with everyone, something caught my eye at the top of my field of vision.  

when i looked up i noticed five (5) very evenly spaced but very dim/muted glowing orbs moving in a modified "arrow or v" formation (i think from se to nw, but i'm not entirely positive of the accurate direction).  i noticed them when they were about 1/3rd of the way across my view of the sky, and it only took them about 6-8 seconds to cross the final 2/3rd of my view and then they faded completely away just before they would have disappeared from my view behind the buildings.  but they definitely didn't go behind the buildings, they just faded away. 

whatever it was, it didn't stand out easily from the sky either.  when i pointed it out to the people i was with it took them 1-2 seconds to see what i was talking about.  i'd say that the other witnesses (my two sons, ages 11 & 13 and another boy who was 12) only saw it for half of the time that i did and my husband missed it entirely. it definitely did not look like a satellite, or shooting star - i have seen both.  

at first i thought that it might have been canadian geese as it was sort of like the v shaped formation that they fly in, but living in the pacific northwest i see geese all the time and they never stay as consistently close, or in the exact shape of what i saw.  not only that, but it was much too high for me to have seen if it had been birds.  additionally, geese are rarely completely silent and what i saw was 100% without sound.

the "lights" for lack of a better word, were not crisp and glittery like stars, but more like filtered reflection of light off the bottom of something.  almost like seeing mother of pearl reflect light, or animal eye-shine in the dark. each light was very circular by itself, and was a pale, pale white or light grey.  

the formation never changed.  it didn't spread apart or get closer together, nor did it speed up or slow down. the path it took across the sky was a very straight line.  in terms of the formation, think of it as a v/arrow with one light in the lead then two more behind and to each side of the lead.  then there were two more lights on the right edge which were behind and to the side.  it would have been a perfect v, but there were two less lights on the left edge - almost like when military jets fly that missing jet formation to honor pilots that have been shot down...

shortly after it was witnessed(maybe 5-10 minutes later), a plane crossed the sky in a completely different direction, but it allowed for me to compare its speed with the unidentified object and there was no comparison.  it took the plane at least 30 or more seconds to cover the same distance.  also a bird flew around overhead about 2 minutes after what i saw disappeared, and its flight path was not only very erratic, but only about 25-30 ft. off the ground and clearly visible to be a bird.

after it disappeared i noted the exact time on my wrist watch to be 11:49pm.  i went back to my room and drew a diagram of the formation i'd seen and asked my sons if it looked like what they had also seen.  they agreed and said that they didn't need to draw anything different.

when it was happening, i was very puzzled as i just couldn't make sense of what i was seeing.  i wasn't freaked out - more like "huh...What the heck is that?"  other than ask the people in my group "what is that?  guys, what is that?" i remained fairly calm.  it was pretty exciting to realize that no one else had an explanation or idea of what it might have been - definitely one of the most surreal moments of my life!!
content.summary: Dim orb/lights in modified arrow formation crossed sky rapidly in straight-line path and faded away over phoenix

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to let my dog in as he was barking a lot (which is typical, there are coyotes around our house in the country). it was dusk and right away something strange caught my eye, almost due west. i thought it was the moon because it was relatively bright, but totally in the wrong place and, sure enough i looked around and found the moon just over my house. it was a slow moving, fairly large and very distant funnel shaped object hovering over the trees. the tip of the vortex or funnel was pointing down and to the left so that the top, or opening looked almost like a morning glory flower in full bloom. i called my partner outside to look at it and she got so creeped out she told me to come back inside. i tried to take a picture but the cloud thing, although visible to the naked eye, was too dark to register on the camera. it reminded me of the norway spiral, although not that big and not with a seeming point of origin on the ground. it didn't seem to be moving at first, but then it sank quite quickly, over a matter of 30 seconds or so, below the tree line, beyond which is lake huron (i live several hundred feet from the shore). i'm sure that it was well over the lake, many kilometers away.
content.summary: Luminscent white vortex-like object

content.detailedDescription: On given night my wife age 36and 2 daughters ages 9&11 saw a randomly pulsating/flashing light reddish/orange in color hovering. i turned around at the next street approximately 100 yards from where they saw it and i as well saw it briefly but it was moving and disappeared rapidly. we turned around and started heading back in the direction we were heading and as we got to the intersection of ijamsville rd and rt 144 i looked back and it was there again. i pulled to the side of the rd and while we were all watching it i called my mom (i am 36) we spoke for about 10 seconds and the phone beeped and went to the unlock screen (motorola atrix 2on the at&t network). signal strength was full on mine and my wife's phones. we called her back and the phone worked fine and i explained to he'd what we were seeing. the object appeared identical and did pretty much the same thing that it did the first time.  20 mins were about all it was for the whole incident. there is no reporting of it and no aircraft were seen in the area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing pulsating light that hovered for approximately 45 seconds then started moving and disappeared rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: Spherical, formed a tight ball and then diffused.
content.summary: Spherical, formed a tight ball and then diffused.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight as i was looking at jupiter just after sunset i noticed a set of six white lights just to right of it with the naked eye. i first thought these were jupiters moons but upon investigation on the internet i soon realized you're not supposed to see jupiter's moons without aid. also they were not in the correct formation.

all six of these lights were white, non blinking like stars and were sitting in a some what pyramid formation on the right side of jupiter.

i looked at them with binoculars and got a much clearer view of them, i think they appeared much to large to be jupiter's moons. as far as i know there is no constalation and as i said they were all white and non blinking like stars. not sure what to make of it. my parents were also observers of this event.
content.summary: Strange white lights next to jupiter

content.detailedDescription:
I was out of the garage, and started to notice a light that moved in the sky, i noticed right away that it was not an airplane or a helicopter or a balloon or a satellite. the light was very bright and was neither too close nor too far, already knowing that it was something strange called my sister and mother ran to prove to them that believe not. the light at one point began to slow, and even though she followed his path to light was everywhere, so the mystery, and soon after i discuss with my sister and mom saying ... yes it is an object that is not human! ... when suddenly we saw him going behind a cloud, and in less than 5 seconds gone!!!.
 by the speed that the object was not human any aircraft could have stopped instantly and disappear. we were shocked, simply disappeared, and the brightness is not see anything else. the brightness was a star as seen in the same size as we see bright venus in those days, was light on all sides. i noted the time so i thought of going on air to ask if something was recorded at the time, but i think they'll end up laughing in my face. i can not stop remembering that moment was beautiful and scary at the same time, because if something off the ground what it was doing here '. i'm from brazil vitoria es. i hope you can understand the way they talked.
content.summary: Bright light like a star in a straight line and disappeared in a cloud raisins a less than 5 seconds

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At my house on the deck. i walked onto my deck preparing for a birthday party. i thought it was apart of the swing set until i noticed something hovering above. it wasw red like the swing set.  a friend and i stared at it until it took off into the distance silently slowly started then almost at the speed of light until it faded into a white dot.
content.summary: Hovered above neighbors swing set, silently, red, then exponentially took off into the sky until it appeared as a white dot

content.detailedDescription: Me and the mrs. were watching our 3 grand children and i happend to look up and there were two white saucer orb things almost directly above us. i have seen these same things sometimes 3 times a week but my wife was never home to show me how to use her camera. she was there this time though. these litterally stayed still when i told my wife i was going in to get the camera and started moving again when i got back outside. i then pointed to one when my wife lost sight of one. i pointed it out and jokingly said stop please and she was shocked when it did stop. this one was the one picture that appears to be dropping plasma or whatever it is behind the tree. they stayed about 10 minutes this time and then vanished.
content.summary: Wife and i watching the grandkids in the backyard looked up and there they were.
